'''''Treasures from the Misty Mountains: A Collector's Guide to Tolkien''''' is a 2001 book by James H. Gilam, offering an overview of collectibles based on Tolkien's legendarium.

Includes a reproduction of a [[Letter to Rayner Unwin (28 December 1953)|postcard from Tolkien to Rayner Unwin]] dated 28 December 1953 (p. 126).<ref name=TB>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=72170|articlename=Treasures from the Misty Mountains. 2001|dated=|website=TB|accessed=7 February 2012}}</ref>

==Contents==
In addition to giving an overview on collecting and the various movies, including a general preview of the as-of-then upcoming ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', the book also covers licensed products from the 1970s onward, including [[:Category:Books|books]], [[:Category:Calendars|calendars]], games, and collectibles from various companies ([[Kinder Surprise]], [[Mithril Miniatures]], [[Sideshow Collectibles|Sideshow-WETA Collectibles]]).

==Reception==

TolkienBooks.net writes that "it is far from complete and contains many errors."<ref name=TB/>
